en.description:
On Damaged:
21% chance for +45% Critical Chance for 12s
+1 Arcane Revive

21% шанс +45% шанс крит. урона в течение 12c.
+1 Мистическое Воскрешение

ko.description:

+1 아케인 부활

de.description:
Bei Schaden:
21 % Chance auf +45 % Krit. Chance für 12 s
+1 Arkana Wiederbelebung

21% de chance pour +45% de Chance de Critique pendant 12s
+1 Réanimation Arcane

Ao ser Atingido:
21% de chance de +45% de Chance Crítica durante 12s
+1 Reanimação Arcana

受到伤害时：

zh-hant.description:

21% 機率得到 +45% 暴擊率 效果，持續 12 秒
